name: Lie in Wait
description: After 1s of standing still and being out of combat, regenerate 100 Health each second

name: Bob and Weave
description: Deploying Transporter increases your movement speed by 40% for 2s

name: Reconfigure
description: Teleporting to your Transporter beacon reduces the duration of DoTs on you by 25%

name: Restore
description: Heal for 20% of maximum health after teleporting to your Transporter beacon

name: Open Season
description: Your Weapon attacks reveal enemies for 4s

name: Beam me up
description: Reduce the transporter channel time of beacon by 25%

name: Amplitude
description: Increase the beam range of Oppressor Mines by 30%

name: Octoppressor
description: Oppressor Mines may target 1 additional enemies

name: Tracking
description: Enemies affected by your Oppressor Mines are revealed to you for 10s

name: Quick Scope
description: Reduce the time it takes to scope in and scope out by 25%

name: Snag
description: Oppressor Mines now cripple targets for 1s

name: Well Stocked
description: You may have up to 3 Oppressor Mines active at once and reduce cooldown by 1s

name: Prodigy
description: Increase your movement speed while scoped by 25%

name: Critical Hits
description: Successful shots made to the upper half of an enemy character will deal 10% increased damage

name: Generator
description: Reduce the time it takes your Sniper shots to fully charge by 0.15s

name: Steady
description: Deal 15% more damage when standing still
